title: 10.07.15 -- How Shane Co. Increased Sales 20%
text: By Christine Kern, contributing writer Shoppers want to shop “at the speed of life.” In Case You Missed It Why Retailers Should Care About IoT Join ISR’s executive editor, Erin Harris, as she talks to Adan Pope, CTO at ShopperTrak, about the Internet of Things’ (IoT) impact on retail. During this insightful podcast, you’ll learn the true definition of IoT and why it matters to retailers of every size. You’ll also learn what IoT done right looks like in today’s evolved retail landscape. By Chester Ritchie, senior VP, Worldpay Learn how cloud-based solutions can give your business a leg up. Simplifying Sales Tax For E-Commerce Merchants States, counties, and municipalities have historically relied on local brick-and-mortar businesses to collect retail sales taxes. These businesses collected the sales tax from their customers, and then remitted the tax proceeds to their local sales tax jurisdiction. It was a straightforward process, and no one much quarreled with who owed the taxes and who would receive them. By Erin Harris, editor in chief The recipe for a top-notch customer experience includes the right mix of technology and an empowered workforce. As consumer demand for a convenient omni-channel retail experience grows, these requirements have a direct impact on the retailer’s approach to logistics, distribution, and fulfillment. Featured Product Jennifer Mobile Jennifer is the voice and name of the Lucas mobile application and the core component of our voice picking and Mobile Work Execution solutions. Jennifer Mobile streamlines hands-on processes for warehouse associates who wear headsets and a rugged mobile computer that allow them to communicate with Jennifer in a two-way conversation.
